/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a panoramic view of a bustling street in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a pedestrian's viewpoint on the sidewalk, immersing the viewer in the city's daily life. The street is flanked by towering buildings and lush greenery, creating a harmonious blend of urban and natural elements. The sky overhead is a blanket of overcast clouds, casting a soft, diffused light over the scene. The colors in the image are predominantly gray and green, reflecting the city's concrete structures and verdant parks.
